item.title: Kubernetes the hard way but on-prem - part 1
item.description: Context In order to practice for the CKA exam, it is recommended to perform the famous Kubernetes The Hard Way by Kelsey Hightower. That guide is one of the best way to create a Kubernetes cluster by installing each component of them separatedly instead of using other tools like Kind, MiniKube, etc. which will create a K8s cluster without dealing about any complexity. In this way, we can learn the componentes involved and how they really interact them.
